title: I Will Not Go the F**k to Sleep
description: A book of nonconformist humor and satire by the author of "The Revised Kama Sutra"; the first chapter imagines a child who, when told to "go the f**k to sleep" by her father, responds in adult language.There are a variety of other humorous and satirical essays in this book, which pokes fun at stereotypes about India and America, Genesis, and politicians, both American and Indian. Some editions of this book, including a special edition, are published under the pseudonym "Benny Profane."
author: Richard Crasta
